医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
体力活动与已婚女性患抑郁症的风险直接相关，但与已婚男性无关已婚人士的体育锻炼与抑郁风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Physical-activity-is-directly-lated-to-the-risk-of-depression-in-married-women-but-not-in-married-男士.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Physical-activity-is-directly-lated-to-the-risk-of-depression-in-married-women-but-not-in-married- men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1a1ca71-2927-418d-845a-826d8df2ecf1 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 05:45:00 -0400 Physical activity is directly related to the risk of depression in married women, but not in married men
放射学领域的人工智能辅助表现出好坏参半的结果医疗人工智能工具最受吹捧的承诺之一是它们能够帮助人类临床医生更精确地解读 X 射线和 CT 扫描等图像，从而做出更准确的诊断，从而提高他们的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/AI-assistance-in-radiology-shows-mixed-results-for-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/AI-assistance-in-radiology-shows-mixed-results-for-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02bfaedf-e51e-4d2f-be4a-94b48c2e74c2 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 23:37:00 -0400 AI assistance in radiology shows mixed results for performance
甚至在第一次使用之前就在大麻电子烟液体中发现了纳米级有毒金属在合法的情况下，电子烟经常被认为是一种“更安全”的消费尼古丁或大麻的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Nano-sized-有毒-金属-found-in-cannabis-vaping-liquids-even-before-thefirst-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Nano-sized-有毒-金属-found-in-cannabis-vaping-liquids-even-before-thefirst-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6edf32d-e56b-4bca-a56c-12d0078eba7b Tue, 19 Mar 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Nano-sized toxic metals found in cannabis vaping liquids even before the first use
客观风险信息促进妊娠患者先兆子痫的预防BMC Pregnancy and Childbirth 的一项新研究发现，有关先兆子痫风险的客观信息可能是推动患者行为改变的关键，并激励怀孕患者遵循医疗服务提供者的预防建议，即使是那些对药物犹豫不决的患者也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Objective-risk-information-motivates-preeclampsia-prevention-among-pregnant-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Objective-risk-information-motivates-preeclampsia-prevention-among-pregnant-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e203e8-d6a7-49fc-acf5-24e6dcfb7d88 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 23:26:56 -0400 Objective risk information motivates preeclampsia prevention among pregnant patients
新研究发现二甲双胍可增强抑制食欲的代谢物二甲双胍治疗可提高 Lac-Phe（一种抑制食欲的代谢物）的水平，可能为其机制提供新的见解，并为肥胖治疗打开大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Metformin-boosts-appetite-suppressing-metabolite-new-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Metformin-boosts-appetite-suppressing-metabolite-new-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d17d636-d64c-4d29-822d-cf3b7d9170c0 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Metformin boosts appetite-suppressing metabolite, new study finds
追踪循环肿瘤 DNA 可以表明胃食管癌的治疗反应约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心及其 Bloomberg~Kimmel 的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，监测肿瘤脱落并在血液中循环的 DNA 水平可以帮助医生准确评估胃食管癌对治疗的反应，并有可能预测未来的预后。癌症免疫治疗研究所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Tracking-circulate-tumor-DNA-could-indicate-gastroesophageal-cancer-treatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Tracking-circulate-tumor-DNA-could-indicate-gastroesophageal-cancer-treatment-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6767a13b-0254-403a-b6a0-d81dfc0f4c7d Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:57:39 -0400 Tracking circulating tumor DNA could indicate gastroesophageal cancer treatment response
普通蔓越莓有助于提高竞技运动员的表现竞技运动员总是在寻找可以帮助他们提高表现的额外优势。根据康科迪亚大学研究人员在《体育活动与营养》杂志上发表的一项新研究，他们可以在普通蔓越莓中找到这种物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Common-cranberry-can-help-improve-performance-of-competitive-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Common-cranberry-can-help-improve-performance-of-competitive-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=666263e3-58dd-4582-98c3-9e8a9ed1c9ff Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:45:56 -0400 Common cranberry can help improve performance of competitive athletes
繁荣的早期环境促进儿童大脑和认知发展研究人员发现，生命第一年的环境支持，称为茁壮成长因子（T 因子），在 3 岁儿童的大脑、认知和社会情感发展中发挥着至关重要的作用，强调了优质环境对幼儿期的重要性发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Thriving-early-environments-boost-brain-and-cognitive-development-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Thriving-early-environments-boost-brain-and-cognitive-development-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3020770d-21f6-48fb-96bb-8e4896276c59 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:42:00 -0400 Thriving early environments boost brain and cognitive development in children
新分析提供了全面的政策解决方案，以增强美国农村的重症监护能力哈佛朝圣者医疗保健研究所领导的一项新政策分析描述了美国农村地区的重症监护危机，并提供了全面的政策解决方案以增强重症监护能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/New-analysis-provides-a-compressive-policy-solution-to-bolster-intense-care-capacity-in-rural-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/New-analysis-provides-a-compressive-policy-solution-to-bolster-intense-care-capacity-in-rural-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65c2c29b-950e-4627-9fea-2c3fcb71ea9a Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:41:00 -0400 New analysis provides a comprehensive policy solution to bolster intensive care capacity in rural America
研究调查精神健康障碍患者的口腔卫生自我保健行为在 IADR 第 102 届全体会议上提出了一项旨在检查自我报告的精神健康障碍患者的口腔卫生自我护理行为的研究，该会议与美国牙科、口腔、口腔医学协会第 53 届年会同时举行。颅面研究和加拿大牙科研究协会第 48 届年会，将于 2024 年 3 月 13 日至 16 日在美国路易斯安那州新奥尔良举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Study-examines-oral-hygiene-self-care-behavior-among-病人-with-mental-health-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Study-examines-oral-hygiene-self-care-behavior-among-病人-with-mental-health-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2b42656-ff9e-48d4-9c92-6459b9ff294d Tue, 19 Mar 2024 22:27:51 -0400 Study examines oral hygiene self-care behavior among patients with mental health disorders
